name: Brotherhood of the Fire Fist - Spirit
effectText: Cannot be used as Synchro Material, except for the Synchro Summon of a Beast-Warrior monster. When this card is Normal Summoned: You can target 1 Level 3 FIRE monster with 200 or less DEF in your GY; Special Summon that target in Defense Position, and if you do, monsters you control cannot attack for the rest of this turn, except Beast-Warrior monsters. You can only use this effect of "Brotherhood of the Fire Fist - Spirit" once per turn.
